Name: Floral Arrangement: "Nearly Aquamarine"
Desc: A floral arrangement centered around an Aquamarine Butterfly Bush that is not yet in full bloom. The florist originally intended to use the budding flowers to display the dynamic beauty of the process of blossoming. But in the world of the Fontaine Research Institute, where Aquamarine Butterfly Bushes carry the meaning of "don't waste time," this kind of arrangement gained the another kind of implicit meaning: "get results fast, or others will steal the credit."
